con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="urn:ServicioAws" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:impl="urn:ServicioAws" xmlns:apachesoap="http://xml.apache.org/xml-soap" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdlsoap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:intf="urn:ServicioAws"> <message name="ejecutarAccionResponse"> <part name="ejecutarAccionReturn" type="xsd:string"></part> </message> <message name="ejecutarAccionRequest"> <part name="in0" type="xsd:string"></part> <part name="in1" type="xsd:string"></part> </message> <portType name="AwsInterface"> <operation name="ejecutarAccion" parameterOrder="in0 in1"> <input name="ejecutarAccionRequest" message="impl:ejecutarAccionRequest"></input> <output name="ejecutarAccionResponse" message="impl:ejecutarAccionResponse"></output> </operation> </portType> <binding name="ServicioAwsSoapBinding" type="impl:AwsInterface"> <wsdlsoap:binding style="rpc" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="ejecutarAccion"> <wsdlsoap:operation soapAction=""/> <input name="ejecutarAccionRequest"> <wsdlsoap:body use="encoded" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" namespace="urn:ServicioAws"/> </input> <output name="ejecutarAccionResponse"> <wsdlsoap:body use="encoded" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" namespace="urn:ServicioAws"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="AwsInterfaceService"> <port name="ServicioAws" binding="impl:ServicioAwsSoapBinding"> <wsdlsoap:address location="http://chmocks:8088/mockServicioAwsSoapBinding"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
